channel.title: How to add a name into my server?
channel.description:
Hello i would like to know how to add this into the server - right next to his name the Crown then Owner, and when you right click them also it says follow Owner : character name ect? how would i do it, i got a picture of what i mean like : [url=http://i40.tinypic.com/nwx53a.jpg]http://i40.tinypic.com/nwx53a.jpg[/url] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/nwx53a.jpg[/img]
Thanks - Matt - Eq -

item.title: How to add a name into my server?
item.dc:creator: @Eclipse639 Eclipse639
item.description:
@Eclipse639 wrote:

[quote=“Wet Dreamss, post:11, topic:424770”][quote author=Eclipse639 link=topic=527432.msg3844749#msg3844749 date=1323542085]
It’s very obviously a 639, you can tell by looking at the client…
[/quote]
If its already in the client, why would you need help. I thought the pic was from another server that you wanted to copy.[/quote]
What he’s trying to do is not client sided, I was just asking him to remove the picture as it is advertising another server, or to atleast blurr out the top portion.

What he’s trying to do is the shitty server sided modification where it reads a “custom” byte in the server infront of a players username. But it fucks up friends list, pming, all that good shit.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add a name into my server?

item.title: How to add a name into my server?
item.dc:creator: @Eclipse639 Eclipse639
item.description:
@Eclipse639 wrote:

Remove your picture as it’s advertising another server,

Open PlayerUpdate.java and search for:

Change to:

if (p.getRights() == 2) { appearanceData.writeRS2String("<b><col=FF0000>Owner</col></b> "+Misc.formatPlayerNameForDisplay(p.getUsername())); } else if (p.getRights() == 1) { appearanceData.writeRS2String("<b><col=800080>Mod</col></b> "+Misc.formatPlayerNameForDisplay(p.getUsername())); } else { appearanceData.writeRS2String(Misc.formatPlayerNameForDisplay(p.getUsername()));

Read full topic

item.title: How to add a name into my server?
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“devenb123, post:4, topic:424770”][quote author=Wet Dreamss link=topic=527432.msg3844648#msg3844648 date=1323536641]
go to client.java (client sided) and search for “cr2”
Then it should state something about your username

you can type in “Owner” within @cr2@
Ex: @cr2Owner@

you can make it cool shades to like

@cr2<shad=66602>Owner@
[/quote]

wrong revision im pretty sure and were would you add it?[/quote]

Your search for “cr2” and read til you see something that says something about text in game. (im just doing this off the top of my head :D) And then replace what i said earlier

Read full topic
